answers.question: Please descibe your experience while using this application, do you think it can be beneficial? Do you have critical aspects?
Do you have unaided vision (i.e., no prescription of glasses/lenses)?
How old are you?
Solving the tasks using this application was fun.
Solving the tasks using this applicationwas boring.
Solving the tasks using this applicationwas interesting.
Solving the tasks using this applicationwas absorbing.
Solving the tasks using this applicationwas enjoyable.
Based on your perception, to what extent do you agree with the following statements
Using this application would improve my job performance
Using this application in my job would increase my productivity.
Using this application would enhance my effectiveness on the job.
Using this application would make it easier to do my job.
I would find this application useful in my job.
Learning to operate this application would be easy for me.
I would find it easy to get  this application to do what I want it to do.
My interaction with this application would be clear and understandable.
I would find this application to be flexible to interact with.
It would be easy for me to become skillful at using this application
I would find this application easy to use.
